title: Just Grandma and Me
description:
Mercer Mayer's Little Critter is spending a day at the beach with his grandma in this classic, funny, and heartwarming book.Celebrate Mother's Day – and your Grandma – with this classic Little Critter book! It's important to cherish and nurture the special bond that can exists between a grandparent and grandchild. This beloved story can help you do just that, as it is the perfect story to read on Mother's Day... or any day!
Mercer Mayer's
 
Little Critter
 stories, which address all the major issues of growing up, are perennial favorites for generations of readers, both young and old!
author: Mercer Mayer
